name: Insects runner
description: The house of the old gnome was attacked by a pack of strange beetles. To repulse an attack, the best wars were sent. You must control 3 cannons that will help you kill the bugs and go ahead. Show your skill and ability to shoot in the game!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, 7 Processor: Intel Core 2 duo + Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP, 7 Processor: Intel Core i3 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 2 GB DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
